name: Brothief
description:
BroThief is a stealth action game in which you have to infiltrate a well-guarded military base and steal secret blueprints and a prototype of the Gauss cannon.

Move: WASD 

Abilities:

Space - danger detection and pathfinding

LBM(Left button mouse) - kill

RBM - inisibility

P.S

Path - displayed as a green line (Space)((For the gifted))
